meanings.definition: (ラテン語) 近づく、接近する、取りかかる、着手する、攻撃する
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to approach, draw near; to undertake, attempt; to attack.

examples.translation: 私は困難な仕事に取りかかる。

verb_forms.present_indicative: adgredior, adgredieris, adgreditur, adgredimur, adgredimini, adgrediuntur
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: adgrediebar, adgrediebaris, adgrediebatur, adgrediebamur, adgrediebamini, adgrediebantur
verb_forms.future_indicative: adgrediar, adgredieris, adgredietur, adgrediemur, adgrediemini, adgredientur
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: adgressus sum, adgressus es, adgressus est, adgressi sumus, adgressi estis, adgressi sunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: adgressus eram, adgressus eras, adgressus erat, adgressi eramus, adgressi eratis, adgressi erant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: adgressus ero, adgressus eris, adgressus erit, adgressi erimus, adgressi eritis, adgressi erunt
verb_forms.present_subjunctive: adgrediar, adgrediaris, adgrediatur, adgrediamur, adgrediamini, adgrediantur
verb_forms.imperfect_subjunctive: adgrederer, adgredereris, adgrederetur, adgrederemur, adgrederemini, adgrederentur
verb_forms.perfect_subjunctive: adgressus sim, adgressus sis, adgressus sit, adgressi simus, adgressi sitis, adgressi sint
verb_forms.pluperfect_subjunctive: adgressus essem, adgressus esses, adgressus esset, adgressi essemus, adgressi essetis, adgressi essent

usage_notes.explanation: adgredior は、deponent verb (形は受動態だが意味は能動態) であることに注意。
